content: from end k4 kfb k2 remove markers row 2 sl1 k to end row 11 sl1 k1 kfb kfb k to 4 sts from end kfb row 3 sl1 k1 kfb kfb p to 4 sts from end kfb kfb k2 kfb k2 row 12 sl1 k to end row 4 sl1 k3 p to 4 sts from end k4 row 13 sl1 k1 kfb kfb p to 4 sts from end kfb row 5 sl1 k1 kfb kfb pm ssk k5 mh k5 kfb k2 k2tog to 5 sts from end pm k1 kfb kfb k2 row 14 same as row 12 row 6 sl1 k3 p to m sm p2tog p14 p2togtbl to m sm p to 4 sts from end k4 row 15 same as row 11 row 7 sl1 k1 kfb kfb k to m sm ssk k3 k1 row 16 same as row 12 you should have 253 yo 6 times k3 k2tog to m sm k to 4 sts from sts end kfb kfb k2 row 8 sl1 k3 p to m sm p2tog p16 p2togtbl change to color 3 to m sm p to 4 sts from end k4 row 1 rs sl1 k1 kfb kfb k to 4 sts from end row 9 sl1 k1 kfb kfb k to m sm ssk k14 kfb kfb k2 257 sts k2tog to m sm k to 4 sts from end kfb kfb k2 row 2 sl1 k to end row 10 sl1 k3 p to m sm p2tog p12 repeat row 1-2 6 more times you should have p2togtbl to m sm p to 4 sts from end k4 281 sts remove markers row 11 sl1 k1 kfb kfb k to 4 sts from end kfb lace band 3 kfb k2 �4 row 12 sl1 k to end row 13 sl1 k1 kfb kfb p to 4 sts from end kfb kfb k2 you should have 309 sts picot bind off *co 2 sts using a knitted cast on bobble 9 sts move the st remaining on your right needle back to your left needle repeat from * until you have bound off all the sts in your row finishing weave in ends and block shawl to finished measurements using pins or blocking wires abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on foll following k knit k2tog knit 2 together kfb knit through the front and back loops of the same st 1 st increased mh make hole with the left needle from the front lift up the bar in-between sts k1 yo k1 yo k1 yo into that bar p purl p2tog purl 2 together p2togtbl purl 2 together through the back loop pm place marker rs right side sl slip sm slip marker ssk slip slip knit st sts stitch stitches ws wrong side yo yarn over for comments or questions about this pattern contact joji at designsbyjoji@gmail com you can also find her on ravelry and instagram as jojilocat and on facebook
